name: Pesto Twists
author: Anonymous
summary: These tasty twists made with pesto, hazelnuts and Parmesan cheese are a delicious way to start the evening.
ingredients: 1 (17.3 ounce) package frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed
1 (7 ounce) container BUITONI® Refrigerated Pesto with Basil
½ cup chopped hazelnuts or almonds
½ cup BUITONI® Freshly Shredded Parmesan Cheese
directions: Place pastry sheets on lightly floured surface
Spread pesto over one rolled pastry sheet
Sprinkle nuts and cheese evenly over pesto
Lay second sheet on top and press lightly
Twist each strip and place on baking sheet
Bake for 15 minutes or until light golden brown
